name: Ha Noi City Tour
description:
Hanoi sure is an attractive destination for foreign tourist coming to Vietnam, the city is filled with wonderful landmarks, such as Ho Chi Minh Complex, Temple of Literature, Hoan Kiem lake, The Old Quarter, Hanoi Museum of Ethology, Hoa Lo Prison... and so on. 
It's my pleasure to travel with you as a friend, not merely a tour guide :)

 These are my 4 recommendations for you to pick at ease (from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM):

No.1: Ho Chi Minh Complex - Temple of Literature - Hoa Lo Prison - Hoan Kiem Lake and The Old Quarter (include Dong Xuan Market).
No.2: Ho Chi Minh Complex - Temple of Literature - Hoan Kiem Lake - Military Museum and Museum of Ethology.
No.3: Ho Chi Minh Complex - Temple of Literature - Bat Trang Pottery Village.
No.4: Bat Trang Pottery Village - Van Phuc Silk Village.
OR: You can pick out the destinations and I will lead your way.

You should notice that visiting Bat Trang Pottery Village or Van Phuc Silk will take you half a day, other places will take  less time. 
So, let's go :)
